name: Wells & Boxes
description:
Move boxes into appropriate wells and pick up the items they give you in return. Boxes are alive and have personality - some like you a lot, others not so much.

Beware of the green sneaky enemies and shoot them before they get to you! Collect stars to summon the fat boss and defeat him to move on to the next level.

This game was created for Sumo Digital Rising Star 2017. Many thanks to the organisers for providing the skeleton code.
